channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System

item.title: CVE-2023-3663|2024-10-02T05:35:40.245Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system
item.description: In CODESYS Development System versions from 3.5.11.20 and before 3.5.19.20 a missing integrity check might allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to manipulate the content of notifications received via HTTP by the CODESYS notification server.
